summary: Posing as a movie producer, a conman attempts to trick an entire village into helping him rob a treasure-laden train.
cast: Akshay Kumar|Katrina Kaif|Akshaye Khanna|Rajiv Laxman|Raghu Ram|Ali Asgar|Dharampal|Vijay Maurya|Apara Mehta|Sachin Khedekar|Aman Verma|Murli Sharma|Arya Babbar|Vishal Dadlani|Anvita Dutt|Sanjay Dutt|Avtar Gill|Kripa Jyoti|Anil Kapoor|Farah Khan|Ishtiyak Khan|Salman Khan|Twinkle Khanna|Viju Khote|Shashi Kiran|Shirish Kunder|Shakti Mohan|Chantal Norton|Chunky Pandey|Sudhir Pandey|Vijay Patkar|Manish Paul|Anjan Srivastav|Avinay Widge
keywords: bound and gagged|child kidnapping|movie reality crossover|memory|forgetting name
title: Tees Maar Khan
